org.jsfml.graphics

Class VertexArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Vertex>
          • org.jsfml.graphics.VertexArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Vertex>, Collection<Vertex>, List<Vertex>, RandomAccess, Drawable

    public class VertexArray
extends ArrayList<Vertex>
implements Drawable
    Defines a drawable set of one or multiple 2D primitives.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
